dcterms:creator: Maarten V de Hoop
Daniel Zhengyu Huang
Elizabeth Qian
Andrew M Stuart
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 40,000 samples of discretized initial conditions on a grid of 200 points, used for predicting the transport of discontinuous waveforms governed by a linear advection equation.
dcterms:title: Datasets for Advection of Discontinuous Waveforms

dcterms:creator: Jayesh K Gupta
Johannes Brandstetter
dcterms:description: A dataset generated by PDEArena for fluid flow systems governed by the 2D shallow-water equations, containing 6,600 trajectories with a temporal spatial resolution.
dcterms:title: Shallow-Water Equations Dataset

dcterms:creator: Zhongkai Hao
Chang Su
Songming Liu
Julius Berner
Chengyang Ying
Hang Su
Anima Anandkumar
Jian Song
Jun Zhu
dcterms:description: A dataset generated by PDEArena for predicting the evolution of a 2D buoyancy-driven flow governed by the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations coupled with a passive scalar transport equation.
dcterms:title: Navier-Stokes Equations Dataset
